title: Advanced Language Proficiency Development Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level comprehension of language structure and foundational online communication experience
context.additional_context: Language education course for office administrative staff, involving online collaborative tasks based on offline classes in limited-technology environments (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively with multicultural members using online collaboration tools.
Learners take a leading role in online discussions and achieve task objectives.
Learners contribute to peer learning by providing specific linguistic feedback during collaborative processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
